public class TicTacToe

This is a multiplayer Tic-Tac-Toe program.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • vote

      Compares the board to valid Tic-Tac-Toe win conditions.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board
      isPlaced - Booleans representing if a move has been made at a given location on the board
      Returns:
      whether the player has won or not
